name: @wpforms/multiselect-checkbox
description: A vanilla JavaScript plugin for creating multiple select checkboxes.
author: WPForms

scripts.minify: cross-env BABEL_ENV=default NODE_ENV=production npm run minify:css && npm run minify:js
scripts.minify:js: rimraf dist/wpforms-multiselect-checkboxes.js && terser src/js/wpforms-multiselect-checkboxes.js -c booleans=true -c comparisons=true -m --module -o dist/wpforms-multiselect-checkboxes.js
